name: Anarch-Bee
description: There seems to be an upset at the hive, where bees are demanding workers' rights. But the Queen doesn't see it their way. What will unfold? Tips and Tricks: - You can launch as many bees as you want; get technical! - The sides of the paddle can help you angle your shots - Try rebounding bees off one another for maximized speed and chaos! Programmers: Westin Montano, Niko Udria, Braxton Mott Sound Designer: Connor Ellis Artist: Ruth Sun
